nodes.text: Ahrisa was a spicy food made of greens and soypro. Usually served in small portions, rolled into a ball and eaten with bread. It was served in many cafes on Coruscant in the last years of the Old Republic. It was also available at the Mos Espa marketplace on Tatooine. Shmi Skywalker served ahrisa to Qui-Gon Jinn and his companions.
